channel.title: 508 Command Help
channel.description: Okay in my 508 server, i want it so that ::master gives all 99's instead of just a few. Where are commands located? and what do i edit/add to the code? please help, i'm stumped.

@Cancel wrote:

Congrats! hope i helped

item.title: 508 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

Those commands are for 317s…i need 508

EDIT: nevermind, i found the command, and just copyed and pasted till i got to 24, compiled, it works

if (cmd[0].equals("master")) { p.addSkillXP(14000000, 0); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 1); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 2); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 3); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 4); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 5); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 6); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 7); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 8); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 9); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 0); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 10); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 11); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 12); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 13); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 14); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 15); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 16); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 17); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 18); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 19); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 20); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 21); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 22); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 23); p.addSkillXP(14000000, 24); } see?

Read full topic

ohh ok, i just have it set to the combat skills only so i dont have it looped, but thanks.

item.title: 508 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Cancel, it would be better to use a loop instead of writing the same thing 24 times.

for (int i = 0; i < 24; i++) { p.skillLvl[i] = 99; p.skillXP[i] = 14000000 }

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

usually they are located in commands.java. once you get there you just ctrl+f then search for “master” then once you find the command, it might say something like…
p.skillLvl[0] = 99;
p.skillXP[0] = 200000000;

and so on like this,
p.skillLvl[1] = 99;
p.skillXP[1] = 200000000;

just copy the original code and paste it till you do all 24 skills, it should look like this
if (cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
p.skillLvl[0] = 99;
p.skillXP[0] = 200000000;
p.skillLvl[1] = 99;
p.skillXP[1] = 200000000;
p.skillLvl[2] = 99;
p.skillXP[2] = 200000000;

and so on, till you do all 24 skills, hoped this helped! (note) 0 is the attack skill, so you only goto 23

Read full topic
